test_results.description: Tests for missing or misconfigured security headers

findings.title: Missing Security Header: X-Frame-Options
findings.description: The X-Frame-Options header is not set, leaving the application vulnerable.

recommendations.title: Add X-Frame-Options Header
recommendations.description: Configure your web server to include the X-Frame-Options header.

findings.title: Missing Security Header: X-Content-Type-Options
findings.description: The X-Content-Type-Options header is not set, leaving the application vulnerable.

recommendations.title: Add X-Content-Type-Options Header
recommendations.description: Configure your web server to include the X-Content-Type-Options header.

findings.title: Missing Security Header: Strict-Transport-Security
findings.description: The Strict-Transport-Security header is not set, leaving the application vulnerable.

recommendations.title: Add Strict-Transport-Security Header
recommendations.description: Configure your web server to include the Strict-Transport-Security header.

findings.title: Missing Security Header: Content-Security-Policy
findings.description: The Content-Security-Policy header is not set, leaving the application vulnerable.

recommendations.title: Add Content-Security-Policy Header
recommendations.description: Configure your web server to include the Content-Security-Policy header.

findings.title: Missing Security Header: X-XSS-Protection
findings.description: The X-XSS-Protection header is not set, leaving the application vulnerable.

recommendations.title: Add X-XSS-Protection Header
recommendations.description: Configure your web server to include the X-XSS-Protection header.

findings.title: Missing Security Header: Referrer-Policy
findings.description: The Referrer-Policy header is not set, leaving the application vulnerable.

recommendations.description: Configure your web server to include the Referrer-Policy header.

findings.title: Missing Security Header: Permissions-Policy
findings.description: The Permissions-Policy header is not set, leaving the application vulnerable.
